title: Why i can't get a Honor Capsule!
body:
**Im Honor Level 3 for 4 days and i can't get a capsule, while my friend got 2 in 3 days.. Whats the problem can anyone tell me and please dont flame/hate?
Thank you!**

replies.body: HEY FRIEND! so Honor Capsules are dropped at random so yea that's why, its just luck. for example lets say key frags are a 3-10 drop, then capsule are like a 1-10 drop. so ya ( pls note that i have no idea what the drop rate is so yea but its the point that matters)
Okey so its a matter of time and luck basiclly.. Thank you friend.

It sounds like you friend got pretty heckin' lucky! Those [**Honor Capsules**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) have a *chance* of dropping anytime you would get a key fragment once you're Honor Rank 3. They aren't guaranteed drops, but you should be on the lookout for them after matches and when you log in to the client.
Okey thank you for the info, much appriciated.
